name: private-dao
description: No-code platform for creating and governing private DAOs on Aztec Network

scripts.contracts:codegen: cd contracts && yarn aztec codegen target -o ../app/src/lib/aztec/artifacts
scripts.deploy:local: cd contracts && yarn ts-node scripts/deploy_dao.ts --network local
scripts.deploy:devnet: cd contracts && yarn ts-node scripts/deploy_dao.ts --network devnet
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contracts && yarn ts-node scripts/deploy_dao.ts --network testnet
scripts.clean: rm -rf contracts/target app/.next app/node_modules node_modules contracts/node_modules
